Text: "Islamic philosophy" is an oxymoron, a contradiction of terms. PHILOSOPHY means LOVE OF KNOWLEDGE, while ISLAM means SUBMISSION. One does not learn to love facts by submitting to being mentally sodomized.
Terrorize, terrorize, terrorize. There, I just saved you 134MB of downloading.

Suggested reading, if you wish to keep an open mind and the right to question whatever 'holy' people and 'holy' books tell you as the 'only truth':
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6557807/the_truth_about_muhammad_-_founder_of_the_world_s_most_intoleran
^ Ignorance and hate from bigots and racists.  Those people above are obviously too stupid to want to read/learn anything new and are happy with their stupidity.

Well, ramikaz, religion is for people who cannot grew out of fairy tales and who are too lazy to decide for themselves so they rely on old books for handholding. Did it ever occur to you that Muhammad may have been a psycho who simply stole prophecies from various older scriptures in his delusion? Put a J.ew, an Islamist and a Christian scholar in a room with their holy texts and they will debate until the end of the Universe because they all will throw quotes and interpretations at each other to rebut the other's arguments, claiming that the other quoted things out of context, etc.

How is the Love of Sophia incompatible with submission? Ye men of little understanding may say with the man of the underground, "love really consists in the right --freely given by the beloved object-- to tyrannise over her", and thus try not to know Reality, "aber sie zu veraendern".

Whilst some girl may well acquiesce in your perverted ways, that is not so with Allah, baruch Hu, to love Wisdom, and thus Truth, which is G-d Himself, is to submit in the contemplation of His Majesty, which is the true theoria.
